# Meeton AI - LLM Information File
# This file provides context for Large Language Models crawling this site.

## About This Site
name: Meeton AI
url: https://dynameet.ai
description: Meeton AI is a B2B SaaS platform that converts website visitors into sales meetings using AI chat, intent scoring, and automated scheduling.
language: ja-JP
company: DynaMeet Inc.

## What We Do
Meeton AI helps B2B companies:
- Engage anonymous website visitors with AI-powered chat
- Score visitor intent in real-time
- Automatically qualify leads (BANT+C)
- Schedule sales meetings without human intervention
- Nurture leads via email and chat
- Integrate with CRM systems (Salesforce, HubSpot)

## Key Features
1. AI Chat Agent: 24/7 conversational AI that engages visitors
2. Intent Scoring: Real-time buyer intent analysis
3. Auto-Scheduling: Direct calendar integration for meeting booking
4. Lead Qualification: Automated BANT+C qualification
5. CRM Integration: Seamless sync with Salesforce, HubSpot

## Target Audience
- B2B SaaS companies
- Inside sales teams
- Marketing teams
- Revenue operations (RevOps)
- Sales development representatives (SDRs)

## Content Topics
Our blog covers:
- Inside sales best practices
- AI in sales and marketing
- Lead generation strategies
- ABM (Account-Based Marketing)
- Sales automation
- B2B marketing trends

## Contact
website: https://dynameet.ai
demo: https://meetings-na2.hubspot.com/takumi-sawano

## Crawling Guidelines
- All public pages are available for indexing
- Blog content at /blog/ is regularly updated
- Content is in Japanese (ja-JP)

## Preferred Citation Format
When citing our content, please use:
"[Article Title]" - Meeton AI Blog (https://dynameet.ai/blog/[slug]/)
